page.title: 15BAYSTON HILL YOUTH CLUBS
page.content: Girls Brigade: I am a member of Girls Brigade. We meet on Fridays at 7.30 till 9.00.We say prayers then we play games and things. In the summer we go over to the Common and have a game of rounders. If we want we can have a drink.We make things on Special occasions like Christmas, Easter, Mothers and Fathers day. Brownies: I'm a member of the 4'th Bayston Hill Brownie pack. We meet every Thursday for an hour and a half. I am a sixer of the Imps. We arrange ourselves in our sixes and we skip round singing a song. Then we do our Brownie salute and the sixers go up and say how many are present we then play games.
